welcome.subject: Welcome to {{storeName}}!
welcome.message: Thank you for creating an account with us. We're excited to have you as a customer!
welcome.benefits: With your new account, you can:
welcome.support: If you have any questions or need assistance, please don't hesitate to contact our customer support team.

verification.subject: Verify your email address
verification.body: Please verify your email address by clicking the button below.
verification.footer: This link will expire in 24 hours. If you didn't create an account, please ignore this email.

orderConfirmation.subject: Order Confirmation #{{orderId}}
orderConfirmation.message: Your order has been received and is being processed. Here's a summary of your purchase:
orderConfirmation.trackingMessage: You will receive another email when your order ships. You can also check the status of your order by clicking the button below.

orderShipped.subject: Your Order #{{orderId}} Has Shipped!
orderShipped.message: Great news! Your order #{{orderId}} is on its way to you.
orderShipped.trackingMessage: You can track your package by clicking the button below:
orderShipped.support: If you have any questions about your order, please don't hesitate to contact our customer support team.

orderDelivered.subject: Your Order #{{orderId}} Has Been Delivered!
orderDelivered.message: Your order #{{orderId}} has been delivered! We hope you're enjoying your purchase.
orderDelivered.support: If you have any issues with your order, please contact our customer support team right away.
orderDelivered.feedbackMessage: We'd love to hear your thoughts! Please take a moment to share your feedback about your purchase.
orderDelivered.thanks: Thank you for shopping with us!

passwordReset.subject: Password Reset Request
passwordReset.message: We received a request to reset your password. If you didn't make this request, you can safely ignore this email.
passwordReset.instruction: To reset your password, click the button below. This link will expire in {{expiryTime}}.
passwordReset.warning: Security Notice: If you didn't request a password reset, please contact our support team immediately as your account may be at risk.
passwordReset.alternative: If the button above doesn't work, you can copy and paste the following link into your browser:

reviewRequest.subject: Share Your Thoughts on Your Recent Purchase
reviewRequest.message: Thank you for your recent purchase! We hope you're enjoying your new items.
reviewRequest.feedback: Your feedback is incredibly valuable to us and helps other customers make informed decisions. Would you mind taking a moment to share your thoughts?
reviewRequest.thanks: Thank you for being a valued customer!

common.unsubscribe: If you no longer wish to receive these emails, you can unsubscribe here.
